hadiths.text: Narrated Ibn `Umar:The Prophet (ﷺ) said, "Wailakum" (woe to you) or "waihakum" (May Allah be merciful to you)." Shu`ba is not sure as to which was the right word. "Do not become disbelievers after me by cutting the necks of one another

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي قَوْلِ الرَّجُلِ وَيْلَكَ
